file_content.text: So this is the big push, huh? Hope I see you on the other side....
White Maw's tough enough to fight the Republic and Empire at the same time. That's crazy.
Thanks for throwing my squad at those turrets. You must think highly of us.
These aren't standard Imperial military we fought. Maybe special forces....
You part of this op? Wish someone would tell me what we're doing here....
